# CHANGELOG

## v4.3.0
* Fix: gatekeeper to handle the case when error is undefined, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4096

## v4.2.2
* Modified response emitter async back to sync and pipe any sync errors via response emitter error topic.

## v4.2.1
* Added: handling of response listeners (node 12) to run in async mode similar to node 10 to to able to capture uncaught errors, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2756  

## v4.1.0
* Added traps for process.exit and event emitter errors, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2682.

## v4.0.2
* Fixed: swallow errors in dev mode, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2568

## v4.0.1
* Added masking of cookies in crash emails

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.11
* Added feature to log Error reason to `restart` file

## v0.1.10
* Fixed: should do client-side redirect to avoid blank pages after first chunk is flushed. https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-311

## v0.1.9
* Added ebayc3 to RegEx Log URL

## v0.1.8
* Added environment & Log URL

## v0.1.7
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.6
* Added option to delay restart

## v0.1.5
* Should not fail due to missing context/function

## v0.1.2
* Extracted uncaught handler into separate function
* Fixed baseurl property to show up in crash email report.

## v0.1.1
Release: Enabled to send email to the input email provided
Fixed: Removed sensitive `Authorization` tokens from the outgoing email.


## v0.1.0
Release: Handle Domain w/GateKeeper
